title: Do we know how many rune pages we will have in runes reforged?
body: On the PBE currently we have access to make 10 separate rune pages, but on live you get two for free. Do we know if we will only have two when runes reforged drops, or will we have 10? Just curious, because having 10 pages allows for a lot smoother transitions between games when you're playing a different champ.

replies.body:
I would very much like more than 2 rune pages, very very much. Mr.bossman here is correct.  for more info
https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/general-discussion/eqp0b4Yh-too-few-rune-pages
I believe you do start with 2 editable rune pages. Your current rune pages will also transfer over to the new rune system as well as 5 preset builds.
